#include <vector>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <utility>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <math.h>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int tc;
	cin>>tc;
	while(tc--)
	{
		string x;
		int c=0,flag=0;
		cin>>x;
		for(int i=0;i<x.length();i++)
		{
			if(x[i]=='T') c++;
			else c--;
			if(c<0) {flag=1; break;}
		}
		if(flag==0 && c==0) cout<<"YES\n";
		else cout<<"NO\n";
	}
}
